bike.description: 100% 4130 Cr-Mo frame, internally relieved No-Oval head tube, weld on rotor plate, pierced top tube, Tube seat-stay bridge, Tube mono-stay BB yoke, w/ 3D forged Cr-Mo 7mm dropouts

components.description: 100% 4130 heat treated, Cr-Mo threadless 1-1/8", 1pc CNC'd steer tube, 1-3/8" blades, w/ u-brake bosses, 6mm drop-outs w/ 38mm OD fork adapters
"Tank FS" threadless, 1-1/8", Cr-Mo, oversized lower cup, nickel plated, with SST ORYG rotor
Specialized forged/CNC'd/relieved alloy, inverted w/ integrated hex nuts and rotor tabs, Grade-8 hardened bolts and nuts bottom-load, 55mm reach
Specialized 4130 Cr-Mo, 2-piece, 190mm rise, 640mm width, 8 degree back-sweep, 2 degree up-sweep
Specialized No-flange, Kraton, 140mm
Dia-Compe 990, u-brake w/"Fiesta" soft compound pads, cable anchor
Dia-Compe 990, u-brake w/"Fiesta" soft compound pads, cable anchor
Dia-Compe "Tech-77", u-brake lever pair, 2 finger, 16mm cable pull, 2pc hinged clamp
Cr-Mo cog, 1/2" x 1/8", 13T
KMC "KOOL", 1/2" x 1/8", Anti-drop inner links, reinforced outer links, nickel plated, 88 links
Specialized Oversized, 3 piece, tig-welded hollow Cr-Mo arms, left and right drive compatible, 180mm crank arms
Solid alloy disc, 36t, 8mm thick, CNC'd center/ 3 drive hole and teeth
Specialized, sealed cartridge, 48 spline, heat treated hollow 22mm Cr-Mo spindle, alloy cups, machined spacers
Specialized 9/16", Cr-Mo axle, sealed cartridge bearing, alloy platform w/ removable screw in pins
Alex Supra B, 20", 36h, triple vertical wall alloy, CNC'd side walls, welded seam, eyelets,
Specialized "Wide Load", 36h, alloy, 14mm hollow Cr-Mo axle, sealed cartridge bearing
Specialized "Flip Side" Dual cassette, 36h, alloy, hollow 14mm Cr-Mo axle, right & left side drive, 6 Sealed cartridge bearings
13g UCP, w/brass nipples
Specialized AssFault, 20" x 2.0", black skinwall, 60 tpi, 100 psi
Specialized AssFault, 20" x 2.0", black skinwall, 60 tpi, 100 psi
20" x 2.0", schraeder valve
Specialized 415 Pro, aramid sides, PU bumpers, 9mm rails and X-brace
Specialized 4130 Cr-Mo, 30.9mm/300mm, forged alloy guts, w/ 8mm Allen bolts, for 9mm rails
Specialized forged alloy 2-bolt, 33.7mm/31.7mm
Specialized Flush-Mount peg (2pcs) system w/integrated chain tensioner and fork adapters, alloy fork cap, chain guard, reflectors, manual
